name: DeleteSyncMapPermission
description: Delete a specific Sync Map Permission.

ServiceSid.description: The SID of the [Sync Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sync/api/service) with the Sync Map Permission resource to delete. Can be the Service's `sid` value or `default`.

MapSid.description: The SID of the Sync Map with the Sync Map Permission resource to delete. Can be the Sync Map resource's `sid` or its `unique_name`.

Identity.description: The application-defined string that uniquely identifies the User's Sync Map Permission resource to delete.
